name: kickboxing-competition-app
description: Web application for drafting kickboxing competitions

scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.setup: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd server && npx server/prisma generate && npx prisma db push && npm run seed
scripts.db:reset: cd server && npx server/prisma db push --force-reset && npm run seed
